CustomField.description: Action label to use for this workflow stage e.g. Respond or Review.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Action Label refers to the label assigned to a stage action within a workflow. It is typically used to indicate the desired action to be taken at that particular stage. For example, in a survey workflow, the Action Label for a stage where participants need to respond to the survey questions could be "Respond", while the Action Label for a stage where survey responses are reviewed could be "Review".
CustomField.label: Action Label
